_meanings:
<ab>N.</ab> of a city,
the modern Oujein in Mālvā, the
capital of Vikramāditya. It is one
of the seven sacred cities of the
Hindus (<ab>cf.</ab> {#avaMti#}), and the first
meridian of their geographers from
which they calculate longitude;  
{#sODotsaMgapraRayavimuKo mA sma BUrujjayinyAH#}
<ls>Me. 27.</ls>
